name: APOCO-LAND
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 108! You play as a shopkeeper who travels lands to find treasure for his little store! You also collect alot of coins along the way. Oh. Did i mention this shop keeper is in an apocolyptic  world?

The theme of the jam was seaside, and the limitation was "Everything dies in one hit."
I tried my best to follow the theme, and i hope you enjoy! 

CONTROLS FOR THE GAME:
Z - Jump

LEFT and RIGHT Arrow keys - Move around

UP Arrow key - Read signs
X - Shoulder bash
X + DOWN (grounded) - Slide
X + DOWN (in air) - Ground Pound
